description: Core Data & Productivity View patterns for displaying and managing structured data

views.name: Grid View
views.description: Responsive grid of items displayed as cards or thumbnails
hig_guidelines: Use consistent spacing and sizing across all grid items
Support multiple column counts for different screen sizes
Provide visual feedback on selection and hover states
Implement smooth transitions when grid layout changes
Consider lazy loading for large datasets
key_features: Adaptive column count based on container width
accessibility: Provide alternative text for visual content

views.name: List View
views.description: Standard vertical list with swipe actions and sections
hig_guidelines: Keep row heights consistent within sections
Use swipe actions sparingly - limit to 2-3 actions per side
Group related items with section headers
Provide clear visual hierarchy within rows
Support pull-to-refresh for dynamic content
accessibility: Support keyboard shortcuts for common actions

views.name: Table View
views.description: Dense data rows with sortable and filterable columns
hig_guidelines: Allow column resizing and reordering
Provide clear sorting indicators (ascending/descending)
Support keyboard navigation between cells
Use alternating row colors for readability
Show column filters inline or in a filter bar
accessibility: Announce column headers and sort state
Support table navigation with arrow keys

views.name: Kanban View
hig_guidelines: Limit visible columns to prevent excessive horizontal scrolling
Use drag-and-drop for intuitive card movement
Show card counts per column
Support WIP (Work In Progress) limits
Provide visual feedback during drag operations
key_features: Search and filter across all columns

views.name: Calendar View
views.description: Month, week, day, or agenda perspectives for time-based data
hig_guidelines: Support multiple view modes (day, week, month, agenda)
Use color coding for event categories
Ensure touch targets are large enough for event selection
Show clear navigation between time periods
Highlight today's date prominently
accessibility: Provide event summaries for screen readers

views.name: Timeline View
views.description: Horizontal bars showing duration and dependencies (Gantt-style)
hig_guidelines: Show clear time scale markers
Support zooming for different granularities
Use tooltips for detailed information
Visualize dependencies with connecting lines
Highlight today's date with a vertical line
key_features: Multiple time scales (day, week, month, quarter)
accessibility: Provide text alternatives for visual timeline

views.name: Detail View
views.description: Full-page view for a single record's properties
hig_guidelines: Organize information hierarchically
Use progressive disclosure for complex data
Provide clear navigation back to list/parent
Support inline editing where appropriate
Show related items and activity history

views.name: Dashboard View
views.description: Composite view aggregating widgets, metrics, and mini-charts
hig_guidelines: Prioritize most important metrics at the top
Allow widget customization and rearrangement
Use consistent visual language across widgets
Support refresh/real-time updates
Provide drill-down capabilities

views.name: Feed View
views.description: Chronological content stream with infinite scroll
hig_guidelines: Implement efficient infinite scroll
Show clear timestamps (relative and absolute)
Provide pull-to-refresh functionality
Support rich content types (text, images, links, polls)
Enable engagement actions (like, comment, share)
accessibility: Provide post summaries for screen readers
